message.raw:
Created a new branch to add the ability of the user to pass arbitarary config
attributes to any device.  This involves some effort to pass **kwargs in
__init__ all the way up to the root Device class.  Part of this will/may
have me writing attributes to a new "Config" group in the device group in the
h5 file, so I will also be moving the code which creates the individual
device group into the root __init__ as well.

message:
Created a new branch to add the ability of the user to pass arbitarary config
attributes to any device.  This involves some effort to pass **kwargs in
__init__ all the way up to the root Device class.  Part of this will/may
have me writing attributes to a new "Config" group in the device group in the
h5 file, so I will also be moving the code which creates the individual
device group into the root __init__ as well.
